skills.name: Slash Rocks
skills.description: Swings a giant sword to deal damage and decrease the target's Defense for 2 turns with a 40% chance. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +20%
skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark> + 0.18*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Taunting Strike
skills.description: Attacks an enemy with a humiliating strike, provoking the target with an 80% chance. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skills.multiplier_formula: 1.9*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.26*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Wanderer (Passive)
skills.description: Decreases the chances of receiving a Critical Hit by 50%, and decreases the cooltime of your skill each time you're attacked. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Reduce Cooltime
skill_effect.description: Reduces cool down counter of skills by 1 or more
